questions.question: The three brothers love ………………………….
questions.description: Each other refers to two people one another refers to more than two people.

questions.question: The husband and the wife should love and respect ………………………….
questions.description: Each other refers to two people one another refers to more than two people.

questions.question: Let …………………………… go now.
questions.description: Let is a verb. A pronoun used as the object of a verb should be in its object form.

questions.question: You are not as intelligent as ……………………………
questions.description: Object pronouns are common after as and than.

questions.question: Neither answer ………………………….. correct.
questions.description: We use a singular verb after either and neither.

questions.question: She is smarter than …………………………….
questions.description: Object pronouns are common after than. Subject pronouns are also possible with a verb.

questions.question: People suffer when ………………………….. do not have money.
questions.description: We use they to refer to people.

questions.question: I enjoy …………………………….. of movies.
questions.description: Use this with kind and these with kinds.

questions.question: I do not trust these ………………………….. of people
questions.description: Use kinds and sorts with these and those.

questions.question: ……………………….. a rainy day, we stayed inside.
This is my car. Is that ……………………………….?
